name: Save Connect response
description: When there is a new call for callable recipe, do action

code.name: receive_request
code.description: New call for Save Connect response

block.name: __adhoc_http_action
block.title: Update Subscription Custom Fields
block.description: Update Subscription Custom Fields in Zuora (Custom)

extended_input_schema.name: path
extended_input_schema.label: Path
extended_input_schema.hint: Base URI is https://rest.apisandbox.zuora.com - path will be appended to this URI. Use absolute URI to override this base URI.

block.name: __adhoc_http_action
block.title: Update Subscription Custom Fields
block.description: Update Subscription Custom Fields in Zuora (Custom)

extended_input_schema.name: path
extended_input_schema.label: Path
extended_input_schema.hint: Base URI is https://rest.apisandbox.zuora.com - path will be appended to this URI. Use absolute URI to override this base URI.

block.name: __adhoc_http_action
block.title: Update Subscription Custom Fields
block.description: Update Subscription Custom Fields in Zuora (Custom)

extended_input_schema.name: path
extended_input_schema.label: Path
extended_input_schema.hint: Base URI is https://rest.apisandbox.zuora.com - path will be appended to this URI. Use absolute URI to override this base URI.

block.name: __adhoc_http_action
block.title: Update Subscription Custom Fields
block.description: Update Subscription Custom Fields in Zuora (Custom)

extended_input_schema.name: path
extended_input_schema.label: Path
extended_input_schema.hint: Base URI is https://rest.apisandbox.zuora.com - path will be appended to this URI. Use absolute URI to override this base URI.

extended_input_schema.name: Id
extended_input_schema.label: ID
extended_input_schema.hint: Enter the ID of the account you want to update.

extended_input_schema.name: AccountNumber
extended_input_schema.label: Account Number
extended_input_schema.hint: Unique account number assigned to the account.

extended_input_schema.name: AdditionalEmailAddresses
extended_input_schema.label: Additional Email Addresses
extended_input_schema.hint: List of additional email addresses to receive emailed invoices.

extended_input_schema.name: AllowInvoiceEdit
extended_input_schema.label: Allow Invoice Editing
extended_input_schema.hint: Indicates if associated invoices can be edited.

extended_input_schema.name: AutoPay
extended_input_schema.label: Auto Pay
extended_input_schema.hint: Indicates if future payments are automatically collected they're due during a Payment Run.

extended_input_schema.name: Batch
extended_input_schema.label: Billing Batch
extended_input_schema.hint: Organizes your customer accounts into groups to optimize your billing and payment operations. Required if you use the Subscribe call.

extended_input_schema.name: BcdSettingOption
extended_input_schema.label: Bill Cycle Day Setting Option
extended_input_schema.hint: Billing cycle day setting option. Set Bill Cycle Day to '0' if Autoset.

extended_input_schema.name: BillCycleDay
extended_input_schema.label: Bill Cycle Day
extended_input_schema.hint: Billing cycle day (BCD) on which bill runs generate invoices for the account. Set to '0' if Bill cycle day is set to 'AutoSet'.

extended_input_schema.name: BillToId
extended_input_schema.label: Bill To ID
extended_input_schema.hint: ID of the person to bill for the account.

extended_input_schema.name: CommunicationProfileId
extended_input_schema.label: CommunicationProfile ID
extended_input_schema.hint: Associates the account with a specified communication profile.

extended_input_schema.name: CrmId
extended_input_schema.label: CRM Account ID
extended_input_schema.hint: CRM account ID for the account. A CRM is a customer relationship management system, such as Salesforce.com.

extended_input_schema.name: Currency
extended_input_schema.label: Currency
extended_input_schema.hint: Currency that the customer is billed in.

extended_input_schema.name: CustomerServiceRepName
extended_input_schema.label: CSR
extended_input_schema.hint: Name of the account's customer service representative, if applicable.

extended_input_schema.name: DefaultPaymentMethodId
extended_input_schema.label: Default Payment Method ID
extended_input_schema.hint: ID of the default payment method for the account.

extended_input_schema.name: InvoiceDeliveryPrefsEmail
extended_input_schema.label: Invoice Delivery Preferences Email
extended_input_schema.hint: Indicates if the customer wants to receive invoices through email.

extended_input_schema.name: InvoiceDeliveryPrefsPrint
extended_input_schema.label: Invoice Delivery Preferences Print
extended_input_schema.hint: Indicates if the customer wants to receive printed invoices, such as through postal mail.

extended_input_schema.name: InvoiceTemplateId
extended_input_schema.label: Invoice Template ID
extended_input_schema.hint: The ID of the invoice template.

extended_input_schema.name: Name
extended_input_schema.label: Name
extended_input_schema.hint: Name of the account as displayed in the Zuora UI.

extended_input_schema.name: Notes
extended_input_schema.label: Notes
extended_input_schema.hint: Comments about the account.

extended_input_schema.name: ParentId
extended_input_schema.label: Parent ID
extended_input_schema.hint: Identifier of the parent customer account for this Account object.

extended_input_schema.name: PaymentGateway
extended_input_schema.label: Payment Gateway Name
extended_input_schema.hint: Gateway used for processing electronic payments and refunds.

extended_input_schema.name: PaymentTerm
extended_input_schema.label: Payment Term
extended_input_schema.hint: Indicates the customer pays for subscriptions.

extended_input_schema.name: PurchaseOrderNumber
extended_input_schema.label: PO Number
extended_input_schema.hint: The number of the purchase order associated with this account.

extended_input_schema.name: SalesRepName
extended_input_schema.label: Sales Rep
extended_input_schema.hint: The name of the sales representative associated with this account, if applicable.

extended_input_schema.name: SoldToId
extended_input_schema.label: Sold To ID
extended_input_schema.hint: ID of the person who bought the subscription associated with the account.

extended_input_schema.name: Status
extended_input_schema.label: Status
extended_input_schema.hint: Allowed values are: Draft, Canceled or Active.

extended_input_schema.name: TaxCompanyCode
extended_input_schema.label: Tax Company Code
extended_input_schema.hint: Unique code that identifies a company account in Avalara.

extended_input_schema.name: TaxExemptCertificateID
extended_input_schema.label: Tax Exempt Certificate ID
extended_input_schema.hint: ID of your customer's tax exemption certificate.

extended_input_schema.name: TaxExemptCertificateType
extended_input_schema.label: Tax Exempt Certificate Type
extended_input_schema.hint: Type of the tax exemption certificate that your customer holds.

extended_input_schema.name: TaxExemptDescription
extended_input_schema.label: Tax Exempt Description
extended_input_schema.hint: Description of the tax exemption certificate that your customer holds.

extended_input_schema.name: TaxExemptEffectiveDate
extended_input_schema.label: Tax Exempt Effective Date
extended_input_schema.hint: Date the the customer's tax exemption starts.

extended_input_schema.name: TaxExemptExpirationDate
extended_input_schema.label: Tax Exempt Expiration Date
extended_input_schema.hint: Date the customer's tax exemption certificate expires.

extended_input_schema.name: TaxExemptIssuingJurisdiction
extended_input_schema.label: Tax Exempt Issuing Jurisdiction
extended_input_schema.hint: Indicates the jurisdiction in which the customer's tax exemption certificate was issued.

extended_input_schema.name: TaxExemptStatus
extended_input_schema.label: Tax Exempt Status
extended_input_schema.hint: Status of the account's tax exemption.

extended_input_schema.name: VATId
extended_input_schema.label: VAT ID
extended_input_schema.hint: EU Value Added Tax ID.

extended_input_schema.label: ID
extended_input_schema.hint: Enter the ID of the account you want to update.
